MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 25-NOV-2020 14:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am due to a fault to a mains cable at Cherrywood road  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:47am on Wednesday, 25 November 2020
